title: Marc Grossman - Wikipedia
snippet: Marc Isaiah Grossman (born September 23, 1951) is an American former diplomat and government official. He served as United States Ambassador to Turkey, Assistant Secretary of State for European Affairs, and Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs.

title: Mark Grossman - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Raised in Arizona, Mark Grossman discovered an interest in acting at an early age performing in a school rendition of 'Beauty & the Beast'. Playing 'the Beast' was an exhilarating experience and introduced Mark to the creative arts.
